Liushutong characters (1)

缗字的基本解释

缗
（緡）
mín
古代穿铜线用的绳子。
钓鱼绳。
古代计量单位：钱十缗（即十串铜钱，一般每串一千文）。

缗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mín］
［《廣韻》武巾切，平真，明。］
［《集韻》眉貧切，平真，明。］
亦作“緍1”。“缗1”的繁体字。
(1)钓丝。
(2)引申为绳子。
(3)谓钓取鱼类。
(4)谓安装弦线。
(5)以衣物相覆。参见“緡緜”。
(6)穿钱的绳索。借指成串的铜钱，亦泛指钱。
(7)指用绳串钱。
(8)量词。古代通常以一千文为一缗。
(9)泯合，芒昧不分。
(10)昏昧。
(11)古国名。夏时之缗国，春秋时属宋，汉置东湣县，故址在今山东省金乡县东北。
(12)姓。见《史记·吴太伯世家》。
[②]［mián］
［《集韻》彌延切，平，明。］
“缗2”的繁体字。
用同“綿”。参见“緡2蠻”。

缗字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緡； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页944第25
【廣韻】武巾切【集韻】眉貧切，?音珉。【正韻】彌鄰切，音民。【說文】釣魚?也。【詩·召南】其釣維何，維絲伊緡。【爾雅·釋詁】緡，綸也。【註】繩也。江東謂之緡。　又【說文】吳人解衣相被謂之緡。【詩·大雅】言緡之絲。【註】緡，被也。　又錢貫也。【前漢·武帝紀】初筭緡錢。【註】緡，絲也，以貫錢也。　又邑名。【左傳·僖二十三年】齊侯伐宋圍緡。【註】緡，宋邑。高平昌邑縣東南有東緡城。　又【集韻】呼昆切，音昏。義同。　又【集韻】彌延切，音棉。通作緜。　又【集韻】弭盡切，音泯。【莊子·則陽篇】雖使丘陵草木之緡。【音義】緡，盛也。　又【莊子·在宥篇】當我緡乎。【音義】緡，泯合也。　又【集韻】美隕切。愍或作緡。痛也。

缗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
缗字的起名意思

钓鱼用的绳子。也指穿铜钱用的绳子。

cord
Basic explanation of words
cord
(cord)
mín
The rope used to wear copper wire in ancient times.
Fishing rope.
Ancient unit of measurement: Qian Shiyu (that is, ten strings of copper coins, usually one thousand wen per string).
cord
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mín］
["Guangyun" Wujin cut, plain and clear. ]
["Jiyun" brows are poor and cut, plain and clear. ]
Also known as "緍1". "缗1" in traditional characters.
(1) Fishing line.
(2) The extension is rope.
(3) It is said to catch fish.
(4) It is said that the string is installed.
(5) Cover with clothing. See "Lian Mian".
(6) The rope to wear money. Borrowing refers to strings of copper coins, and also refers to money in general.
(7) Refers to stringing money with rope.
(8) Quantifiers. In ancient times, a thousand literals were usually regarded as one.
(9) The ambiguity is indistinguishable.
(10) Ignorance.
(11) Ancient country name. In the summer, it belonged to the Song Dynasty. In the Spring and Autumn Period, it belonged to the Song Dynasty, and Dongmao County was set in the Han Dynasty.
(12) Last name. See "Historical Records·Wu Taibo Family".
[②]［mián］
["Jiyun" is extended and cut, flat, Ming. ]
"缗2" in traditional characters.
Use the same "mian". See "Lian 2 Barbarian".
cord
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　缗; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 944 25
[Guangyun] Wujin cut [Jiyun] Poor and cut eyebrows,? Yin Min. 【Zheng Yun】Mix neighbors, sound people. [Said the text] Fishing? Also. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】It’s fishing Weihe, Weisiyi. 【Erya·Shigu】Lun, Lun Ye. [Note] Rope also. Jiang Dong said it was stubborn.　[Said the text] Wu people's undressing phase is said to be embarrassing. 【Poetry·Daya】The thread of words. [Note] 缗, quilt also.　Money Guanya again. [Previous Han·Wu Emperor Ji] Early Yun made money. [Note] 缗, silk also, to pass money also.　Also known as the town. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-Three Years] Qi Hou defeated Song Weizhen. [Note] Yu, Song Yi. There is Donglin City in the southeast of Changyi County, Gaoping.　[Jiyun] Hu Kunqie, the sound is dim. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] Long cut, sound cotton. Pass for cotton.　[Jiyun] It’s all cut, and the sound is obliterated. 【Zhuangzi·Zeyang】Although it makes the hills and grasses haunted. [Sound and Meaning] Yu, Sheng Ye.　[Zhuangzi·Zaiyou Chapter] When I am stunned. [Sound and Meaning] 缗, 泯合也.　[Jiyun] Beautifully cut. Stunned or confused. It hurts too.

cord
Name meaning
Rope for fishing. Also refers to the rope used to wear copper coins.
mín, hún
I mín, hún сущ.
1)* леса (для удочки)
2) шнур, верёвка (для нанизывания монет); связка монет
II mín гл.
1)* накидывать (одежду)
2)* перевязывать, связывать
III mín собств.
1) Минь (фамилия)
2) геогр. Минь (город княжества 宋, эпоха Чуньцю, на территории нынешней пров. Шаньдун)
